oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Great Smoky Mountain Park is now assured
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An article on the planning and development of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

For many years visitors to the Great Smoky Mountains were impressed by the natural beauty and argued for the region to be protected as a national park. By the 1920s, Knoxville civic leaders and others began serious efforts to promote the creation of the national park.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
